title: Smart Data Models - vibrations Observed
description: The vibrations observed in a specific place.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be VibrationsObserved

dateObserved.description: Property. Date and time of the observation in ISO8601

accelerationMeasured.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Magnitude of the vibrations observed (e.g. Earthquake) or other floor movements. Units:'m/s2'
